entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
